revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> ==Be respectful== <!--T:1--> You must respect all users, regardless of your liking towards them. Treat others the way you want to be treated.
==Keep swearing to a minimum== <!--T:2--> The use of profanity should be kept to a minimum. However, any derogatory language towards any user is prohibited.
==Keep on topic== <!--T:3--> All pages must contain relevant and accurate information
==No cheating chat== <!--T:4--> Do not make pages about cheats for the game.
==No Spamming== <!--T:5--> Don't send a lot of small messages right after each other.
==No pornographic/adult/other NSFW material== <!--T:6--> This is a community wiki and not meant to share this kind of material. </translate>
